name: WonderBot
0:
”Alexa open Wonder Bot”
”Alexa ask Wonder Bot what is my favorite bot?”
”Alexa ask Wonder Bot”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wonder bot
des:
Wonder Bot is a bot that will remember the things you often forget. Be it birthdays, Wi-Fi passwords, anniversary dates, and much more, just tell Wonder and ask for it when you forget.

Remember:
Wonder Bot can remember the things you often forget. For example, you can say something like, 'Remember the gate code is 9095.'

Recall:
If you ever forget something you've already told Wonder Bot, just ask! For example, 'What's my gate code?

Note - This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Wonder
